name: High Compression Audio File
summary: Learn about .HCA files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: One significant improvement of the ADX2 format over the ADX format is that music tracks can be layered to play multiple tracks of music at the same time. The ADX2 format is developed by CRI Middleware, a Japanese company that specializes in audio and video software in the entertainment industry.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
